title: [Dragonspine and Krodera]
description: The street widens into a circular plaza several hundred feet across.  Dwarves and giantmen lounge on stone benches by a massive granite fountain in the center.  The burbling of the waters, the low mumblings of the dwarves and the booming laughter of the giants somehow blend together into a vibrant harmony.
paths: Obvious paths: north, east, south, west
